item.description:
Do you like to sing?*

*singing skills optional

Many people have expressed interest in having a Karaoke meetup!

We will first meet at 7PM over at :

The Draft Bar and Grille (cheap draft beer @ $2.50)
34 Harvard Ave.
Allston, MA 02134
This venue is open to everyone 18 years of age and older
But you must be 21 to drink.

then at 8PM all walk over to

DOREMI Karaoke on Cambridge Ave

NOTE:
- This is a Karaoke-Box style Karaokeyasan with the latest English, Japanese, Korean songs and many others
- They don't serve or allow you to bring alcohol

Because of the need for reservations, the number of spaces is set at 10 - if there is enough interest, we will open up another room for those on the wait list.

The price is usually around $7 per person per hour depending on how many come.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet first at Draft Bar on 34 Harvard Ave (take Green Line to Harvard Ave Station)
item.name: Karaoke Time
